mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT c.* FROM im_conversation c JOIN im_conversation_member cm ON c.id = cm.conversation_id LEFT JOIN im_message m ON c.last_message_id = m.id WHERE cm.user_id = #{userId} AND cm.is_deleted = 0 AND (c.name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') OR m.content LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%')) ORDER BY cm.is_pinned DESC, c.last_message_time DESC
